Springboro Ordinances

Codified Ordinances of Springboro, Ohio

Download this project as a .zip file Download this project as a tar.gz file

CODIFIED ORDINANCES OF SPRINGBORO, OHIO

PART SIX - GENERAL OFFENSES CODE

CHAPTER 636 Offenses Relating to Persons

636.01 NEGLIGENT HOMICIDE.

636.02 ASSAULT.

636.021 VEHICULAR ASSAULT IN A CONSTRUCTION ZONE.

636.03 NEGLIGENT ASSAULT.

636.04 AGGRAVATED MENACING.

636.041 MENACING BY STALKING.

636.05 MENACING.

636.06 UNLAWFUL RESTRAINT.

636.07 CHILD STEALING.

636.08 COERCION.

636.09 NONSUPPORT OF DEPENDENTS.

636.10 SUSPENSION OF SENTENCE ON POSTING BOND.

636.11 ENDANGERING CHILDREN.

636.12 INTERFERENCE WITH CUSTODY.

636.13 CONSENSUAL ABORTION.

636.14 MISUSE OF 9-1-1 SYSTEM.

636.145 TELECOMMUNICATION HARASSMENT.

636.15 THREATENING OR HARASSING TELEPHONE CALLS.

636.16 PLACING HARMFUL SUBSTANCE OR OBJECTS IN FOOD OR CONFECTION.

636.17 DOMESTIC VIOLENCE.

636.175 TEMPORARY PROTECTION ORDER.

636.18 HAZING.

636.19 SALE OF TOBACCO PRODUCTS TO MINORS.

636.20 CRIMINAL CHILD ENTICEMENT.

636.21 CONTRIBUTING TO UNRULINESS OR DELINQUENCY OF A CHILD.
